devdoc.details: Enables V2Upgrader to read some contract state before it renounces the proxy admin role. (Proxy admins cannot call delegated methods.) It is also used to test approve/transferFrom.

fiatTokenOwner().details: Renamed to fiatTokenOwner due to the existence of Ownable.owner()

owner().details: Tells the address of the owner

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

devdoc.title: V2 Upgrader Helper

proxy().notice: The address of the FiatTokenProxy contract
